Nah, there's plenty of 700MB releases out there. This is what we need more.
Pardon my ignorance, but what is the difference in the sizes. Im new at downloading on here and not always sure when too and when not too download. So far ive had decent luck. Thanks for any info.

apple016 - Your a baffoon, an MP4 encoded in x264 will only be a small file but better quaility than an AVI file!!!

Know your facts before you start giving out advise!
